Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Rejuvenating Flames]{Rejuvenating Flames}

You create a gout of flame that both heals and burns. You restore 1d4 HP to all allies in the area, and those allies gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saves for 1 minute. Enemies in the area take [[/r 1d4[fire]]] damage with a basic Reflex save. Heightened (+1) You restore an additional 1d4 HP to your allies and deal an additional [[/r 1d4[fire]]] damage to enemies.
